mapper.select: SELECT report_code, week_code, report_reg_date, report_start_date, report_end_date, report_title, report_assigned_score, report_attached_file, course_code FROM report_info WHERE course_code = #{courseCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report_info (report_code, week_code, report_reg_date, report_start_date, report_end_date, report_title, report_assigned_score, report_attached_file ) VALUES ( #{weekCode}||LPAD(report_seq, 8, '0'), #{weekCode}, SYSDATE, #{reportStartDate}, #{reportEndDate}, #{reportTitle}, #{reportAssignedScore}, #{reportAttachedFile} )
